api_list.name: List stories by section
api_list.description: The Top Stories API returns an array of articles currently on the specified section.

required_parameters.name: section
required_parameters.description: The section the story appears in.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ny-times-top-stories.p.rapidapi.com/home.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ny-times-top-stories.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ny-times-top-stories.p.rapidapi.com/{section}.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ny-times-top-stories.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
